amendment.description: An amendment to prohibit funds made available for customs and border protection fencing, infrastructure, and technology from being used for anything but at least two layers of reinforced fencing and roads.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to prohibit funds made available for customs and border protection fencing, infrastructure, and technology from being used for anything but at least two layers of reinforced fencing and roads.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Royce amendment (A046) Failed by recorded vote: 149 - 272 (Roll no. 486).
